transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan sir disconnect ho gaya tha call.
Executive: To main keh raha tha aapka address ka issue tha wo address to sahi ho gaya tha wo dikhne wala aur dusra main haan jo agar aapka dusra address hai na ek baar main pata kar lunga uske bare mein update de dunga nature of business aapka retailer wholesale tha.
Customer: Haan theek hai.
Executive: Haan aur ji abhi to services hosting to aapki 14 November ko hui thi live ho gayi thi kal humne live box ke liye discussion kiya tha to isliye activeness to haan abhi to activeness aapki dikhayega nahi baki jo tha ki lead manager pe maine bataya tha na ki daily active rehna do do buyer ko at least teen reply karna.
Customer: Sir lead aaye to sahi lead main tab attend karunga jab lead aaye inquiry to aaye.
Executive: Haan haan inquiry aayegi dekhenge do inquiry shayad aa gayi hongi usme hogi aap call disconnect hone ke baad dekhna do inquiry hongi shayad haan usme show hoga ki dheere dheere teen message kar dena activeness badhegi aapki algorithm mein active user mein count hoge sath hi sath by lead.
Customer: Inquiry ko inquiry ko main direct call kar sakta hu kya?
Executive: Inquiry ko haan call bhi kar sakte hai whatsapp pe bhi message kar sakte hai.
Customer: Main call karu ki message karu IndiaMART pe kaise kaise karna hai.
Executive: IndiaMART pe bhi kar sakte hai side mein whatsapp ka bhi aata hai whatsapp pe bhi message kar sakte hai aur call bhi kar sakta hu.
Customer: Haan call bhi kar sakte hai aur jaise main whatsapp se contact karunga man lo.
Executive: Haan haan bolo bolo side ho jayega.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir batao.
Executive: Haan main keh raha tha ki direct call hai unko miss mat karna ultimately side effect agle month pe dikhta hai aur ki by lead maine abhi discuss kari thi na pichli call pe ki teen consume ho gaye jo 10 days ke ho sakta hai haan ji save deposit locker consume kar li hogi aapko ek by lead aaj aa chuki hai abhi to jyada nahi hai kyuki service live hui hai to ek hi by lead hai jo abhi available hai recent mein Godrej safety locker abhi call disconnect hone ke baad usko check karna kaam ki hai to connect kar lena buyer se theek hai theek hai aur review ka maine kaha tha ki review aapko jab jin jin se deal karte the aapko review karte jana usme benefit hoga trust badhta jayega.
Customer: Theek hai aur agar main man lo whatsapp se whatsapp ke through connect karta hu unse whatsapp ke through message karta hu to IndiaMART pe effect padega kya.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi usse koi effect nahi padega wo aapki apni choice hai aap unse connect kaise bhi kare dekhiye main bata hu.
Customer: IndiaMART mein mera score down ho jayega.
Executive: Nahi jaise aap keh rahe do teen message nahi jaise aap keh rahe do teen message karne hai.
Executive: Main batata hu jaise lead aayi na aapke pass haan lead aayegi aap waha se jab lead ko open karenge theek hai haan open mein jaise whatsapp icon ke rahega uspe click karenge na to direct aapko whatsapp pe le jayega theek hai IndiaMART whatsapp se interlinked hai theek hai aapki jo official whatsapp hoga na jo aapki company ka name dikhega uspe aa jayega aur jaise waha pe message karoge na yaha bhi active rahegi aap active apne inquiry to aap kar hi liye aur whatsapp pe click karke kar diya.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Call miss mat karna inquiry ka acha rahega kyuki abhi to status aapka activeness dikhega nahi new aayi hai ek Godrej wali status ko jarur check karna baki usme kya abhi ab to main dekh raha tha ki sare aapke top product mein top like top products mein hi hai usme to abhi kuch nahi hai baki kuch products the wo to out of stock the to wo add nahi kare abhi.
Customer: Out of stock hai out of stock mein koi product nahi hai.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye main dekh leta hu.
Executive: Haan jaise commun vapor bread cake.
Customer: Kya tha kya kya kya.
Executive: Jaise vapor machine burger bun.
Customer: Burger bun machine.
Executive: Haan cake chocolate cake ye ho sakta hai.
Customer: Ye to ye to hamare wo hai hi nahi haan isliye ye thodi hai kuch isliye ye irrelevant hai theek hai isliye ye aapke show nahi ho theek hai baki aapke jo bhi.
Customer: Ye to hamare food product hai hi nahi ye to kya hua hai ye to koi product hi nahi hai hamara.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi ho sakta hai ye pehle ke ho ye deactivated hi hai theek hai to koi nahi hai aapke haan live mein nahi hai aapke live mein correct product hai save deposit locker hai ye sare top mein hai abhi har category ke aap lead consume karte rehna catalog score to maine bata diya tha 85 aapka bahut acha abhi bhi 807 hai product aapke total 27 product hai usme 807 catalog score hai catalog score to maine bata diya tha ki kahan se aap badha sakte hai koi bhi product ka to main ek dekh leta hu.
Executive: Haan koi bhi lead aapko not agar irrelevant hai na to usko not interested mark kar dena kyuki abhi service live hui hai to abhi to aapne koi waise mark nahi karenge abhi to dikhega nahi jaise koi aapko category ya kisi se bhi related hai na maine kal bataya tha delete ka button rehta hai not relevant ka.
Customer: Samjha nahi main kya tha.
Executive: Main bata raha hu agar koi lead aapko irrelevant aati hai na jisme aap deal nahi karte to maine bataya tha waha delete ka button rehta hai na irrelevant lead pe haan.
Customer: Haan haan usko aap haan usko click karke aap apna selection kar sakte hai ki haan haan wo haan theek hai wo deactivate kar diya wo haan location to aapki all over India hi rahegi na deal karne ke liye.
Customer: Location nahi sir Rajasthan Rajasthan Rajasthan deal karta hai sir.
Executive: Haan Rajasthan mein to location mein filter option bataya tha na maine filter Rajasthan pe laga ke karega retail ke liye retail ke leads ke liye aapko bataya tha order value aur bulk ka option theek hai engagement aap bilkul rakhiyega engagement ke maine point bata diye aapko unpe rakhiyega activeness bhi rakhiyega ek by lead hai isko ek baar jarur check karna Godrej ki aayi hai inquiry to last mein purani dikha raha hai do inquiry aayi hongi unko dekh lena haan connect kar lena recent mein maine recent mein maine check kiya tha to koi koi inquiry dikhi nahi mere ko sir.
Customer: Haan abhi dekhega usme hogi aur abhi koi aayi hai to mujhe pata nahi haan lead mein aur lead mein to ye aayi hai Godrej ki isko ek baar check karega agar kaam ki ho to theek hai aur ek cheez aur main dekh leta hu catalog score aapka acha hai aur jo bhi product aapke agar jinka aap dekh sakte hai overall score agar 75 dikh raha hai ek photo add karna 80 ho jayega 80 85 theek hai specification daloge aur add ho jayega koi aapka aisi to abhi koi lead aisi consume nahi hui hai jisse kuch effect aaye jaise koi irrelevant lead aapne abhi consume nahi kari category jo added na ho aisa kuch nahi hua kyuki abhi to abhi aana hi chalu hui hai lead theek hai review pe dhyan dijiyega aur mere sath touch mein rahega kabhi bhi connection ho to connect karega aur abhi is call ke baad na aapka jo feedback generate hua tha main usko close kar dunga ek closer ka message jayega aapko wo closer ka feedback tabhi hoga jab aapke kis cheez ka kis cheez ka feedback.
Customer: Main batata hu ye feedback kya hota hai jaise sir ne galti se by mistake call kar diya tha na abhi ek to aapka maine ticket raise kiya tha address change karne ka wo to fulfill ho gaya dusra sir ne by mistake kisne call kiya aapko abhi haan sir ne call kar diya tha by mistake dopahar mein to usme kya hota hai na ki ek feedback generate kar deta hai system automatic acha acha theek hai wo close karna hai theek hai haan usko close karna important hota hai uske liye maine abhi description bhi likh diya sir ne is tarah se baat ki thi unhone kaha galti se lag gaya tha to fir maine aapko call kiya kyuki IndiaMART ka pura handle aap hi kar rahe hai na isko haan theek hai main karunga abhi kya hoga haan official mail id aapke pass hai na sir ki haan mere pass mail id to hai haan feedback aayega uspe click karna hai ji ji ji usme mail pe haan feedback aayega ki IndiaMART ticket ke naam se aayega usko yes select kar lijiyega theek hai taki main kar dunga kar dunga kar dunga theek hai sir aur sir do teen cheeze thi mere doubts the haan bataiye ek to ispe udham number add karna hai 10 number bhi hum add kar sakte hai ye bhi karte hai to isse kya benefits hum track hoti hai matlab authenticity badh jati hai seller ki ek main bata hu main bata hu ho jati hai isse bhi kuch fayda hota hai kya nahi nahi nahi main bata hu jaise jo aapke details hai na jo already added hai wo sufficient hai baki details jo aap add karte ho na number haan haan baki udham aadhar card number add karte ho to ye kya hai ki psychological pe ho jayega jaise koi buyer aayega na to usse psychologically wo dekhega ki jyada cheeze added hai jyada usko information milegi to us hisab se jata hai haan isme to ye hai ki kar dena kar dena matlab ye main puch raha hu main kar sakta hu na ye haan haan jitni detail aap badh jati hai badh jati hai ji ji bilkul isse positive effect aayega theek hai aur ek sawal aur tha jaise wahi sawal tha ki jaise aap keh rahe ho do teen message karne hai aapko har din to do lead ke teen message karne hai minimum jaise whatsapp pe agar usko connect karunga to whatsapp pe agar main teen char message karta hu to wo IndiaMART pata lag jayega na aisa to nahi hai ki main bata hu dekhiye abhi aapne bataya tha to koi dikat nahi hai main bata hu dekhiye do teen message inquiry pe kya tha ki maine isliye kaha tha ki man lijiye aap whatsapp pe us kar rahe ho na inquiry pe do teen message kar doge to activeness mein count ho gaya ab jab aapne whatsapp pe bhi jaoge na system se tabhi wo isme aap active user mein aoge main kya hota hai jo lead manager hota hai na jo aap khol rahe ho lead manager un inquiry ko dekhna un inquiry pe jo icons rehte hai unpe click karna main usse activeness catch hoti hai teen message ka to maine isliye rakha tha ki usse kya hota hai na ki aap connect ho jate ho buyer se theek hai baki whatsapp pe bhi aap main kam karunga main whatsapp pe bhi whatsapp pe message karta rahunga IndiaMART ke jo message hai usse bhi karta rahunga ek hi baat hai matlab aap kaise bhi connect kar liya ya whatsapp pe kare whatsapp pe kar lijiye main jo system catch karta hai na wo activeness aise karta hai ki jaise aapne kitni bar lead manager khola inquiry check kar rahe ho inquiry challo challo samajh gaya main samajh gaya haan aur review kar rahe ho activity kar rahe ho catalog link bhej dena agar main unko direct calling karta hu to isse bhi effect padega IndiaMART pe haan haan bilkul bilkul direct calling se bhi effect padega engagement badhti hai aapki aapki haan challo theek hai done ab theek hai feedback kar do main feedback kar dijiyega haan theek hai sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Address issue, wants to update address.

- Inquiries not being received.

- Wants to know the effect of contacting via WhatsApp.

- Wants to know about adding Udyam and 10 number.



Resolution:

- Address issue resolved.

- Explained about inquiry process and lead manager.

- Explained that there will be no effect.

- Explained the psychological effect of adding details.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check Godrej lead.

- Customer to provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- address, buyleads, whatsapp, udhyam number, feedback
